title: Business Card, Business Card for Faculty of Architecture Landscape and Design, University of Toronto, 1999
title_raw: Business Card for Faculty of Architecture Landscape and Design, University of Toronto
creditline: Gift of Bruce Mau Design Inc.
description:
Business card for Faculty of Architecture Landscape and Design at University of Toronto.
Recto: Partial view of logo "al&d" (in blue) in vertical orientation on white. Imprinted across bottom: "faculty of architecture landsc/ape and design university of toronto (in darker shade of blue). 
Verso: Imprinted from top left, left justified, contact information: "T 416 978 0869/ F 416 971 2094/ nives@clr.utornoto.ca (all in bold)/ Nives Corak (in bold) Barch/ Visual Resources and Exhibition Curator/ Visual Resources Centre/ Faculty of Architecture, Landscape, and Design/ University of Toronto/ 230 College Street, Toronto ON Canada M5T 1R2" (in black).

tombstone.epitaph:
Business Card, Business Card for Faculty of Architecture Landscape and Design, University of Toronto, 1999. Printed card stock. 
Gift of Bruce Mau Design Inc.. 2000-58-8
